formalpara.title: Figure 8. View of a phalloidin stained 1.5 fold wild type embryo
formalpara.para: (A) Whole embryo shown from a left dorsal view. Two bundles of actin filaments running longitudinally along left dorsal muscle quadrant are visible. The outline of hypodermal cells is also visible as well the circumferential actin cables (arrows). (B) A cross section of the embryo illustrating the polarized position of the actin filaments within the muscle cells. C and D are schematic views of A and B respectively.
